name: Pyramids Rush Solitaire Online
description:
Pyramids Rush Solitaire Online - play and compete with other online pyramids solitaire players for top score!
Pyramids Rush features clear realistic cards that are a pleasure to play with on your iPhone/iPad.
To play Pyramids Rush, you just need to select an open card from any pyramid with a value 1 point away (higher or lower) than the value of an open upcard in the bottom left corner.
Suit does not matter.
For example, if the open single bottom card is a 10, then you can either match it with a Jack or 9 from the Pyramids.

The selected card from the pyramid would then replace the open upcard, and some previously closed cards would open up.
If there are no open cards on the pyramids that are 1 point away from the open upcard, you can use the deck to flip for the right card.

You can also use the Joker card, in the bottom right, to match with any future card!
You will continue playing until you clear the pyramids and get to the new level.
As you clear every pyramid, you gradually build up a Sphinx that completes after all of the cards from two 52-card decks have been cleared.

Pyramids Rush Solitaire Online uses two standard 52-card decks and one Joker card.
